com.googlecode.flaxcrawler.concurrent
Interface TaskQueue

All Known Implementing Classes:
TaskQueueImpl
public interface TaskQueue

Base task queue interface

Method Summary
 void addWorker(TaskQueueWorker worker)
          Adds task queue worker.
 Task dequeue()
          Retrieves and removes the head of this queue, or returns null if this queue is empty.
 void dispose()
          Disposes task queue
 void enqueue(Task task)
          Enqueues new task to the inner queue
 boolean isStarted()
          Returns true if TaskQueue is started.
 void join()
          Joins worker threads
 void start()
          Starts task queue workers
 void stop()
          Stops all workers

isStarted

boolean isStarted()
Returns true if TaskQueue is started. Otherwise returns false. Warning - it can return false while stopping but not fully stopped.
